item.title: John Wells Has Produced Four Decades of TV Hits, Including ‘The Pitt.’ He Has Some Advice for Hollywood
item.description: THR’s TV Producer of the Year offers an Rx for what’s ailing the industry and candidly examines the high highs (‘The West Wing’) and bizarre lows (racist ‘E.R.’ notes) of his own spectacularly prolifi
